title: Research
description: The Research feature leverages external search engines and LLMs to provide users with comprehensive and insightful information on a given topic, enhancing their coding and research workflows.
acceptance_criteria: Users can submit a search query to the backend, specifying the topic they want to research.
The backend application retrieves relevant search results from a search engine (e.g., Google Custom Search) based on the user's query.
The backend application utilizes an LLM to summarize each search result, providing concise and informative summaries to the user.
The backend application provides a summary of the entire research topic based on the summaries of individual results.
The backend application supports streaming of research results, allowing the frontend to display results progressively as they become available.
